creator: Zeplin Studios
descriptionHtml:
Create Beautiful Notes

Create stunning notes in seconds with a wide variety of rich text formatting options. Add images, videos, attachments, voice notes, reminders and more.

Organize & Manage

Create folders to keep your notes organized. Browse and manage all of your folders and notes in one screen.

Templates

Creates notes from a wide variety of beautiful prebuilt templates. Our templates feature liking, commenting and sharing so you know which templates stand out in the crowd.

Handwriting & Drawing

Quickly create beautiful drawings and handwritten notes with lines, brushes, pens, colors and more. Insert images and draw over them. Share, email, and favorite your handwritten notes, drawings and images.

Version History

No more lost information. See and restore from a version history for all of your notes with no limitations. Easily edit and manage different versions of a note.

Export To PDF

Instantly export any of your notes to .pdf format and send it via email along with images, voice notes, attachments and more.

Share

Instantly share notes, ideas, images and more via email or through other apps.

Dark Theme

Join the dark side. Our dark theme is beautifully crafted to be easy on the eye and easy on your battery. Switch between light and dark themes whenever you want with the flick of a switch.

Favorites

Add notes, ideas and templates to favorites with the click of a button to quickly find what's most important to you.

Search & Browse

Use powerful search with suggestions, recent searches and popular searches to quickly find any note or template. Browse by category to see templates for a number of areas.

Secure & Encrypted

Data sent between your device and the Cloud is fully encrypted. All of your data is stored on secure Google Firebase servers.

Offline Notes

Your notes are available even when your device is offline. Create a note and it will be synced to the Cloud when a connection is established.

Powered by Google Firebase

Sign in on any device to see all your notes, folders, favorites, published content, user profile and more.
descriptionShort: Create beautiful notes with videos, images, attachments, voice notes & more.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Our latest release introduces templates. We’ve add the ability for users to be able to create notes from a variety of beautiful prebuilt templates. Be sure to check out the new handwriting and drawing feature that was added in our previous release. We have also fixed some bugs and improved the general stability and performance of the app.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Our latest release introduces templates, lists and text insertion from images. Be sure to check out handwriting and drawing that was added in our previous release. We have also fixed some bugs and improved the general stability and performance of the app.

title: Note-ify: Note Creation, Management & Sharing

creator: Zeplin Studios
descriptionHtml:
Create Beautiful Notes

Create stunning notes in seconds with a wide variety of rich text formatting options. Add images, videos, attachments, voice notes, reminders and more.

Organize & Manage

Create folders to keep your notes organized. Browse and manage all of your folders and notes in one screen. Create different color folders for even more organization.

Templates

Creates notes from a wide variety of beautiful prebuilt templates. Our templates feature liking, commenting and sharing so you know which templates stand out in the crowd.

Handwriting & Drawing

Quickly create beautiful drawings and handwritten notes with lines, brushes, pens, colors and more. Insert images and draw over them. Share, email, and favorite your handwritten notes, drawings and images or create Google Drive backups.

Lists

Create a list to quickly add, remove and strike items with helpful autofill suggestions. Lists can also be shared a variety of ways and backed up to Google Drive.

Insert Text From An Image

Got handwritten notes that you want in a digital format? No problem! Select an image then we'll analyze and insert any text found in the image into your note.

Speed-To-Text

Tap a button and start talking! Your speech will be converted to text and inserted into your note in a matter of seconds. A quick and easy way to save your thoughts.

Version History

No more lost information. See and restore from a version history for all of your notes with no limitations. Easily edit and manage different versions of a note.

Export To PDF

Instantly export any of your notes to .pdf format and send it via email along with images, voice notes, attachments and more.

Google Drive

Create a Google Drive backup of any note including images and formatting with the click of a button.

Share

Instantly share notes, ideas, images and more via email or through other apps.

Dark Theme

Join the dark side. Our dark theme is beautifully crafted to be easy on the eye and easy on your battery. Switch between light and dark themes whenever you want with the flick of a switch.

Favorites

Add notes, ideas and templates to favorites with the click of a button to quickly find what's most important to you.

Search & Browse

Use powerful search with suggestions, recent searches and popular searches to quickly find any note or template. Browse by category to see templates for a number of areas.

Fingerprint & Pass Code Security

Need another layer of security? Enable fingerprint or pass code security with the flick of a switch.

Secure & Encrypted

Data sent between your device and the Cloud is fully encrypted. All of your data is stored on secure Google Firebase servers.

Offline Notes

Your notes are available even when your device is offline. Create a note and it will be synced to the Cloud when a connection is established.

Powered by Google Firebase

Sign in on any device to see all your notes, folders, favorites, published content, user profile and more.

Favorites

Add notes, ideas and templates to favorites with the click of a button to quickly find what's most important to you.

Search & Browse

Use powerful search with suggestions, recent searches, popular searches and search in a note to quickly find what you need. Browse by category to see templates for a number of topics.

Fingerprint & Pass Code Security

Need another layer of security? Enable fingerprint or pass code security with the flick of a switch.

Secure & Encrypted

Data sent between your device and the Cloud is fully encrypted. All of your data is stored on secure Google Firebase servers.

Offline Notes

Your notes are available even when your device is offline. Create a note and it will be synced to the Cloud when a connection is established.

Powered by Google Firebase

Sign in on any device to see all your notes, folders, favorites, published content, user profile and more.

title: Note-ify: Note Creation, Management & Sharing

creator: Zeplin Studios
descriptionHtml:
Are you looking for a great note taking app? You've come to the right place. Whether you’re looking to create notes with rich text, images, videos, voice notes, attachments, templates, reminders or just a quick list, we've got you covered. You'll get all of these features and a ton more for free. Note-ify packs a punch with a host of premium features that many other apps would charge for.

Discover a beautiful feature rich app that not only looks stunning but will keep all of your important notes and documents organised. Use folders, favourites, search and version history to keep track of what matters to you and never lose important information. Need some inspiration? Start with one of our pre-built templates to kick off your note taking. We've even built a liking and commenting system so you can see which templates people love.

Forget having a separate app for making lists. Note-ify quick lists are perfectly integrated into the app so they can be searched and organised into your folders and favourites just like all of your other notes.

Do you like the idea of mixing handwritten notes with digital notes? No problem. We provide handwriting and drawing with a bunch of tools like pens, brushes, colours, lines, sticky note and more. You can even insert an image and draw or write over it. We can search images for text and insert the text right into your note making the text fully searchable.

We have a stunning dark theme that's easy on the eye and easy on your battery. You can select from a variety of accent colours to customise the look of your app even further or create different colour folders. Make Note-ify yours.

There are loads of ways to share your notes. Email notes with the click of a button, export to PDF, backup to Google Drive or share through other apps.

Ways to use Note-ify:

1. Note taking
2. Quick lists
3. Reminders
4. Voice notes
5. Attachments
6. Templates
7. Speech-to-text
8. Videos
9. Favourites
10. Handwriting and drawing
11. Search images for text

Get the most out of Note-ify:

Powered by Firebase and the Google Cloud Platform. Create, edit and share notes across any of your Android devices. No connection? No problem. Your data will be synced to the cloud and across your devices when a connection is established. Add an extra layer of security with fingerprint/pass code authentication.

You never know what sparks a great idea. Get inspired, save your ideas, organise them and share with others – all from your phone!

Download Note-ify and experience the next generation of note taking. Start creating, managing and sharing your notes today.

Are you looking for a great note taking, task manager, planner, organiser and to-do lists app? You’ve come to the right place because we’ve got all of this and more. Whether you’re looking to create notes with rich text, images, videos, voice notes, attachments, templates, reminders, manage tasks or just a quick to-do list, we’ve got you covered. You’ll get all of these features and a ton more for free. Note-ify packs a punch with a host of premium features that many other apps would charge for.

What can you do with Note-ify? Well, these things, to name just a few.

1. Take great notes
2. Organise with folders, favourites, search and versions
3. Manage your tasks
4. Back up your documents
5. Dictate with speech-to-text
6. Customise your theme and colours
7. Strike, edit and delete items in quick to-do lists
8. Email your notes
9. Build with templates
10. Take photos of handwritten notes and insert the text into your note
11. Create video notes by pasting a YouTube URL
12. Handwriting and drawing with a variety of tools like sticky notes, lines and images
13. Organise
14. Plan

Discover a beautiful feature rich app that not only looks stunning but will keep all of your important notes and documents organised. Use folders, favourites, search, task management and version history to keep track of what matters to you and never lose important information. Need some inspiration? Start with one of our pre-built templates to kick off your note taking. We’ve even built a liking and commenting system so you can see which templates people love.

Forget having a separate app for making lists. Note-ify quick to-do lists are perfectly integrated into the app so they can be searched and organised into your folders and favourites just like all of your other notes.

Do you like the idea of mixing handwritten notes with digital notes? No problem. We provide handwriting and drawing with a bunch of tools like pens, brushes, colours, lines, sticky note and more. You can even insert an image and draw or write over it. We can search images for text and insert the text right into your note making the text fully searchable.

We have a stunning dark theme that’s easy on the eye and easy on your battery. You can select from a variety of accent colours to customise the look of your app even further or create different colour folders. Make Note-ify yours.

There are loads of ways to share your notes. Email notes with the click of a button, export to PDF, backup to Google Drive or share through other apps.

Ways to use Note-ify:

1. Note taking
2. Quick to-do lists
3. Reminders
4. Voice notes
5. Attachments
6. Templates
7. Speech-to-text
8. Videos
9. Favourites
10. Handwriting, drawing and sticky notes
11. Search images for text
12. Email
13. Backups
14. Share
15. Task manager
16. Organiser
17. Planner

Get the most out of Note-ify:

Powered by Firebase and the Google Cloud Platform. Create, edit and share notes across any of your Android devices. No connection? No problem. Your data will be synced to the cloud and across your devices when a connection is established. Add an extra layer of security with fingerprint/pass code authentication.

You never know what sparks a great idea. Get inspired, save your ideas, organise them and share with others – all from your phone!

Start creating, managing and sharing your notes, to-do lists and tasks. Download and install Note-ify today and experience the next generation note taking, task manager, to-do lists, planner and organiser app.
descriptionShort: Take better notes & manage tasks with to-do lists, reminders, planner & more.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Our latest release introduces accent colour selection and text insertion from images. Users can now choose from a variety of colours for the primary accent colour. We've also added the ability to insert text from an image into a note. Be sure to check out quick lists and handwriting. As always, we have fixed some bugs and improved the general stability and performance of the app.

title: Note-ify: Note Taking, Task Manager, To-Do List

creator: Zeplin Studios
descriptionHtml:
Are you looking for a great note taking, task manager, planner, organiser and to-do lists app? You’ve come to the right place because we’ve got all of this and more. Whether you’re looking to create notes with rich text, images, videos, voice notes, attachments, templates, reminders, manage tasks or just a quick to-do list, we’ve got you covered. You’ll get all of these features and a ton more for free. Note-ify packs a punch with a host of premium features that many other apps would charge for.

What can you do with Note-ify? Well, these things, to name just a few.

1. Take great notes
2. Organise with folders, favourites, search and versions
3. Manage your tasks
4. Back up your documents
5. Dictate with speech-to-text
6. Customise your theme and colours
7. Strike, edit and delete items in quick to-do lists
8. Email your notes
9. Build with templates
10. Take photos of handwritten notes and insert the text into your note
11. Create video notes by pasting a YouTube URL
12. Handwriting and drawing with a variety of tools like sticky notes, lines and images
13. Organise
14. Plan

Discover a beautiful feature rich app that not only looks stunning but will keep all of your important notes and documents organised. Use folders, favourites, search, task management and version history to keep track of what matters to you and never lose important information. Need some inspiration? Start with one of our pre-built templates to kick off your note taking. We’ve even built a liking and commenting system so you can see which templates people love.

Forget having a separate app for making lists. Note-ify quick to-do lists are perfectly integrated into the app so they can be searched and organised into your folders and favourites just like all of your other notes.

Do you like the idea of mixing handwritten notes with digital notes? No problem. We provide handwriting and drawing with a bunch of tools like pens, brushes, colours, lines, sticky note and more. You can even insert an image and draw or write over it. We can search images for text and insert the text right into your note making the text fully searchable.

We have a variety of stunning themes:

1. Classic
2. Dark
3. Fall
4. Storm
5. Metallic
6. Beach
7. Unicorn
8. Forest

Our dark theme is easy on the eye and easy on your battery. Heading to the beach? Switch to the beach theme. You can select from a variety of accent colours to customise the look of your app even further or create different colour folders. Make Note-ify yours.

There are loads of ways to share your notes. Email notes with the click of a button, export to PDF, backup to Google Drive or share through other apps.

Start with one of our pre-built templates to kick off your note taking. We’ve even built a liking and commenting system so you can see which templates people love.

Choose from a variety of stunning themes. Our dark theme is easy on the eye and easy on your battery. Heading to the beach? Switch to the beach theme. You can select from a variety of accent colours to customise the look of your app even further or create different colour folders.

There are loads of ways to share your notes. Email notes with the click of a button, export to PDF, backup to Google Drive or share through other apps.

Powered by Firebase and the Google Cloud Platform. Create, edit and share notes across any of your Android devices. No connection? No problem. Your data will be synced to the cloud and across your devices when a connection is established. Add an extra layer of security with fingerprint/pass code authentication.

You never know what sparks a great idea. Get inspired, save your ideas, organise them and share with others – all from your phone! Start creating, managing and sharing your notes, to-do lists and tasks. Download and install Note-ify today and experience the next generation note taking, task manager, to-do lists, planner and organiser app.
descriptionShort: Take better notes & manage tasks with to-do lists, reminders, planner & more.

descriptionShort: Take better notes & manage tasks with to-do lists, reminders, planner & more.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Our latest release introduces the home screen widget. Users can now enable the widget to see all of their starred notes at a glance. The widget menu includes the ability to quickly create a new note, list, handwritten note or quick reminder. As always, we have fixed some bugs and improved the general stability and performance of the app.

title: Note-ify: Note Taking, Task Manager, To-Do List

creator: Zeplin Studios
descriptionHtml:
Are you looking for a great note taking, task manager, planner, organiser and to-do lists app? You’ve come to the right place because we’ve got all of this and more.

What can you do with Note-ify? Well, a bunch of things.

Take great notes, plan and organise with quick to-do lists. Have something important that you need to remember? No problem! Set a reminder on any of your notes or lists and get a notification at the time that you set. Use audio options like voice notes or dictate with speech=to-text to quickly record instead of typing. Attach files to your notes or create notes from templates to enhance your note-taking even further. Create video notes by simply pasting a YouTube URL when creating a text note. Hit the star button to favourite and easily navigate to your most important notes. We’ve made it even easier and quicker to create notes by importing text from pdf, txt, png or jpg files. Simply select a file and we’ll extract the text and create a note for you.

You’ll get all of these features and a ton more for free. Note-ify packs a punch with a host of premium features that many other apps would charge for.

Discover a beautiful feature rich app that not only looks stunning but will keep all of your important notes and documents organised. Use folders, favourites, search, task management and version history to keep track of what matters to you and never lose important information. Need some inspiration? Start with one of our pre-built templates to kick off your note taking. We’ve even built a liking system so you can see which templates people love.

Forget having a separate app for making lists. Note-ify quick to-do lists are perfectly integrated into the app so they can be searched and organised into your folders and favourites just like all of your other notes.

Do you like the idea of mixing handwritten notes with digital notes? No problem. We provide handwriting and drawing with a bunch of tools like pens, brushes, colours, lines, sticky note and more. You can even insert an image and draw or write over it. We can search images for text and insert the text right into your note making the text fully searchable.

Choose from a variety of stunning themes. Our dark theme is easy on the eye and easy on your battery. Heading to the beach? Switch to the beach theme. You can select from a variety of accent colours to customise the look of your app even further or create different colour folders.

There are loads of ways to share your notes. Email notes with the click of a button, export to PDF, backup to Google Drive or share through other apps.

Powered by Firebase and the Google Cloud Platform. Create, edit and share notes across any of your Android devices. No connection? No problem. Your data will be synced to the cloud and across your devices when a connection is established. Add an extra layer of security with fingerprint/pass code authentication.

You never know what sparks a great idea. Get inspired, save your ideas, organise them and share with others – all from your phone! Start creating, managing and sharing your notes, to-do lists and tasks. Download and install Note-ify today and experience the next generation note taking, task manager, to-do lists, planner and organiser app.

Set a reminder on any of your notes or lists and get a notification at the time that you set. Use audio options like voice notes or dictate with speech=to-text to quickly record instead of typing. Attach files to your notes or create notes from templates to enhance your note-taking even further. Create video notes by simply pasting a YouTube URL when creating a text note. Hit the star button to favourite and easily navigate to your most important notes. We’ve made it even easier and quicker to create notes by importing text from pdf, txt, png or jpg files. Simply select a file and we’ll extract the text and create a note for you.

You’ll get all of these features and a ton more for free. Note-ify packs a punch with a host of premium features that many other apps would charge for.

Discover a beautiful feature rich app that not only looks stunning but will keep all of your important notes and documents organised. Use folders, favourites, search, task management and version history to keep track of what matters to you and never lose important information. Need some inspiration? Start with one of our pre-built templates to kick off your note taking. We’ve even built a liking system so you can see which templates people love.

Forget having a separate app for making lists. Note-ify quick to-do lists are perfectly integrated into the app so they can be searched and organised into your folders and favourites just like all of your other notes.

Do you like the idea of mixing handwritten notes with digital notes? No problem. We provide handwriting and drawing with a bunch of tools like pens, brushes, colours, lines, sticky note and more. You can even insert an image and draw or write over it. We can search images for text and insert the text right into your note making the text fully searchable.

Choose from a variety of stunning themes. Our dark theme is easy on the eye and easy on your battery. Heading to the beach? Switch to the beach theme. You can select from a variety of accent colours to customise the look of your app even further or create different colour folders.

There are loads of ways to share your notes. Email notes with the click of a button, export to PDF, backup to Google Drive or share through other apps.

Powered by Firebase and the Google Cloud Platform. Create, edit and share notes across any of your Android devices. No connection? No problem. Your data will be synced to the cloud and across your devices when a connection is established. Add an extra layer of security with fingerprint/pass code authentication.

You never know what sparks a great idea. Get inspired, save your ideas, organise them and share with others – all from your phone! Start creating, managing and sharing your notes, to-do lists and tasks. Download and install Note-ify today and experience the next generation note taking, task manager, to-do lists, planner and organiser app.
descriptionShort: Take better notes & manage tasks with to-do lists, reminders, planner & more.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Our latest release introduces the home screen widget. Users can now enable the widget to see all of their starred notes at a glance. The widget menu includes the ability to quickly create a new note, list, handwritten note or quick reminder. Start with one of our pre-built templates to kick off your note taking. We’ve even built a liking system so you can see which templates people love.

Forget having a separate app for making lists. Note-ify quick to-do lists are perfectly integrated into the app so they can be searched and organised into your folders and favourites just like all of your other notes.

Do you like the idea of mixing handwritten notes with digital notes? No problem. We provide handwriting and drawing with a bunch of tools like pens, brushes, colours, lines, sticky note and more. You can even insert an image and draw or write over it. We can search images for text and insert the text right into your note making the text fully searchable.

Choose from a variety of stunning themes. Our dark theme is easy on the eye and easy on your battery. Heading to the beach? Switch to the beach theme. You can select from a variety of accent colours to customise the look of your app even further or create different colour folders.

There are loads of ways to share your notes. Email notes with the click of a button, export to PDF, backup to Google Drive or share through other apps.

Powered by Firebase and the Google Cloud Platform. Create, edit and share notes across any of your Android devices. No connection? No problem. Your data will be synced to the cloud and across your devices when a connection is established. Add an extra layer of security with fingerprint/pass code authentication.

You never know what sparks a great idea. Get inspired, save your ideas, organise them and share with others – all from your phone! Start creating, managing and sharing your notes, to-do lists and tasks. Download and install Note-ify today and experience the next generation note taking, task manager, to-do lists, planner and organiser app.

Attach files to your notes or create notes from templates to enhance your note-taking even further. Hit the star button to favourite and easily navigate to your most important notes.

Embed web pages by pasting a link directly into your note or through the Android share menu. How about creating a video note? This is made simple by clicking an icon and adding a YouTube URL. Do you need to insert text from an image? No problem. Simply select an image file with the click of a button, we’ll search the image for text and insert the text into your note. The text is then digitised and fully searchable. Perfect for making any handwritten note digital and keeping everything organised.

You’ll get all of these features and a ton more. Note-ify packs a punch with a host of premium features.

Discover a beautiful feature rich app that not only looks stunning but will keep all of your important notes and documents organised. Use folders, favourites, search, task management and version history to keep track of what matters to you and never lose important information. Need some inspiration? Start with one of our pre-built templates to kick off your note taking. We’ve even built a liking system so you can see which templates people love.

Forget having a separate app for making lists. Note-ify’s quick to-do lists are perfectly integrated into the app so they can be searched and organised into your folders and favourites just like all of your other notes.

Do you like the idea of mixing handwritten notes with digital notes? No problem. We provide handwriting and drawing with a bunch of tools like pens, brushes, colours, lines, sticky note and more. You can even insert an image and draw or write over it.

Choose from a variety of stunning themes. Our dark theme is easy on the eye and easy on your battery. Heading to the beach? Switch to the beach theme. You can select from a variety of accent colours to customize the look of your app even further or create different colour folders.

There are loads of ways to share your notes. Email notes with the click of a button, export to PDF, backup to Google Drive or share through other apps.

Sync notes and data between the Android and web apps in real-time. You’ll get free unlimited access to the web app. Enable the home screen widget to see all of your starred notes at a glance. The widget menu includes the ability to quickly create a new note, list or handwritten note. We also have a new note shortcut to jump into note creation from your home screen. Use the clipboard feature to quickly select and paste previously copied text into a note or list.

Powered by Firebase and the Google Cloud Platform. Create, edit and share notes across any of your Android devices. No connection? No problem. Your data will be synced to the cloud and across your devices when a connection is established. Add an extra layer of security with fingerprint/pass code authentication.

You never know what sparks a great idea. Get inspired, save your ideas, organise them and share with others – all from your phone! Start creating, managing and sharing your notes, to-do lists and tasks. Download and install Note-ify today and experience the next generation note taking, task manager, to-do lists, planner and organiser app.

Do you like the idea of mixing handwritten notes with digital notes? No problem. We provide handwriting and drawing with a bunch of tools like pens, brushes, colours, lines, sticky note and more. You can even insert an image and draw or write over it.

Choose from a variety of stunning themes. Our dark theme is easy on the eye and easy on your battery. Heading to the beach? Switch to the beach theme. You can select from a variety of accent colours to customize the look of your app even further or create different colour folders.

There are loads of ways to share your notes. Email notes with the click of a button, export to PDF, backup to Google Drive or share through other apps.

Sync notes and data between the Android and web apps in real-time. You’ll get free unlimited access to the web app. Enable the home screen widget to see all of your starred notes at a glance. The widget menu includes the ability to quickly create a new note, list or handwritten note. We also have a new note shortcut to jump into note creation from your home screen. Use the clipboard feature to quickly select and paste previously copied text into a note or list.

Powered by Firebase and the Google Cloud Platform. Create, edit and share notes across any of your Android devices. No connection? No problem. Your data will be synced to the cloud and across your devices when a connection is established. Add an extra layer of security with fingerprint/pass code authentication.

You never know what sparks a great idea. Get inspired, save your ideas, organise them and share with others – all from your phone! Start creating, managing and sharing your notes, to-do lists and tasks. Download and install Note-ify today and experience the next generation note taking, task manager, to-do lists, planner and organiser app.

creator: Zeplin Studios
descriptionHtml:
Are you looking for a great note taking, task manager, planner, organiser and to-do lists app? You’ve come to the right place because we’ve got all of this and more.

What can you do with Note-ify? Well, a bunch of things.

Take great notes, plan and organise with quick to-do lists. Have something important that you need to remember? No problem! Set a reminder on any of your notes or lists and get a notification at the time that you set. Use audio options like voice notes or dictate with speech-to-text to quickly record instead of typing. Attach files to your notes or create notes from templates to enhance your note-taking even further. Hit the star button to favourite and easily navigate to your most important notes.

Embed web pages by pasting a link directly into your note or through the Android share menu. How about creating a video note? This is made simple by clicking an icon and adding a YouTube URL. Do you need to insert text from an image? No problem. Simply select an image file with the click of a button, we’ll search the image for text and insert the text into your note. The text is then digitised and fully searchable. Perfect for making any handwritten note digital and keeping everything organised.

You’ll get all of these features and a ton more. Note-ify packs a punch with a host of premium features.

Discover a beautiful feature rich app that not only looks stunning but will keep all of your important notes and documents organised. Use folders, favourites, search, task management and version history to keep track of what matters to you and never lose important information. Need some inspiration? Start with one of our pre-built templates to kick off your note taking. We’ve even built a liking system so you can see which templates people love.

Forget having a separate app for making lists. Note-ify’s quick to-do lists are perfectly integrated into the app so they can be searched and organised into your folders and favourites just like all of your other notes.

Choose from a variety of stunning themes. Our dark theme is easy on the eye and easy on your battery. Heading to the beach? Switch to the beach theme. You can select from a variety of accent colours to customize the look of your app even further or create different colour folders.

Sync notes and data between the Android and web apps in real-time. You’ll get free unlimited access to the web app. Enable the home screen widget to see all of your starred notes at a glance. Use the clipboard feature to quickly select and paste previously copied text into a note or list.

Powered by Firebase and the Google Cloud Platform. Create, edit and share notes across any of your Android devices. No connection? No problem. Your data will be synced to the cloud and across your devices when a connection is established. Add an extra layer of security with fingerprint/pass code authentication.

Choose from a variety of stunning themes. Our dark theme is easy on the eye and easy on your battery. Heading to the beach? Switch to the beach theme. You can select from a variety of accent colours to customize the look of your app even further or create different colour folders.

There are loads of ways to share your notes. Email notes with the click of a button, export to PDF, backup to Google Drive or share through other apps.

Sync notes and data between the Android and web apps in real-time. You’ll get free unlimited access to the web app. Enable the home screen widget to see all of your starred notes at a glance. The widget menu includes the ability to quickly create a new note, list or handwritten note. We also have a new note shortcut to jump into note creation from your home screen. Use the clipboard feature to quickly select and paste previously copied text into a note or list.

Powered by Firebase and the Google Cloud Platform. Create, edit and share notes across any of your Android devices. No connection? No problem. Your data will be synced to the cloud and across your devices when a connection is established. Add an extra layer of security with fingerprint/pass code authentication.

You never know what sparks a great idea. Get inspired, save your ideas, organise them and share with others – all from your phone! Start creating, managing and sharing your notes, to-do lists and tasks. Download and install Note-ify today and experience the next generation note taking, task manager, to-do lists, planner and organiser app.

title: Note-ify: Note Taking, Task Manager, To-Do List

creator: Zeplin Studios
descriptionHtml:
Are you looking for a great note taking, task manager, planner, organiser and to-do lists app? You’ve come to the right place because we’ve got all of this and more.

What can you do with Note-ify? Well, a bunch of things.

Take great notes, plan and organise with quick to-do lists. Have something important that you need to remember? No problem! Set a reminder on any of your notes or lists and get a notification at the time that you set. Use audio options like voice notes or dictate with speech-to-text to quickly record instead of typing. Attach files to your notes or create notes from templates to enhance your note-taking even further. Hit the star button to favourite and easily navigate to your most important notes.

Embed web pages by pasting a link directly into your note or through the Android share menu. How about creating a video note? This is made simple by clicking an icon and adding a YouTube URL. Do you need to insert text from an image? No problem. Simply select an image file with the click of a button, we’ll search the image for text and insert the text into your note. The text is then digitised and fully searchable. Perfect for making any handwritten note digital and keeping everything organised.

You’ll get all of these features and a ton more. Note-ify packs a punch with a host of premium features.

Discover a beautiful feature rich app that not only looks stunning but will keep all of your important notes and documents organised. Use folders, favourites, search, task management and version history to keep track of what matters to you and never lose important information. Need some inspiration? Start with one of our pre-built templates to kick off your note taking. We’ve even built a liking system so you can see which templates people love.

Forget having a separate app for making lists. Note-ify’s quick to-do lists are perfectly integrated into the app so they can be searched and organised into your folders and favourites just like all of your other notes.

Do you like the idea of mixing handwritten notes with digital notes? No problem. We provide handwriting and drawing with a bunch of tools like pens, brushes, colours, lines, sticky note and more. You can even insert an image and draw or write over it.

Choose from a variety of stunning themes. Our dark theme is easy on the eye and easy on your battery. Heading to the beach? Switch to the beach theme. You can select from a variety of accent colours to customize the look of your app even further or create different colour folders.

There are loads of ways to share your notes. Email notes with the click of a button, export to PDF, backup to Google Drive or share through other apps.

Sync notes and data between the Android and web apps in real-time. You’ll get free unlimited access to the web app. Enable the home screen widget to see all of your starred notes at a glance. The widget menu includes the ability to quickly create a new note, list or handwritten note. We also have a new note shortcut to jump into note creation from your home screen. Use the clipboard feature to quickly select and paste previously copied text into a note or list.

Powered by Firebase and the Google Cloud Platform. Create, edit and share notes across any of your Android devices. No connection? No problem. Your data will be synced to the cloud and across your devices when a connection is established. Add an extra layer of security with fingerprint/pass code authentication.

Start creating, managing and sharing your notes, to-do lists and tasks. title: Note-ify: Note Taking, Task Manager, To-Do List

creator: Zeplin Studios
descriptionHtml:
Are you looking for a great note taking, manager and organiser app? You’ve come to the right place because we’ve got all of this and more.

What can you do with Note-ify? Well, a bunch of things.

Take great notes, plan and organise. Attach images, video, audio, files or anything else to your notes. Create notes from templates to enhance your note-taking even further. Hit the star button to favourite and easily navigate to your most important notes. Embed web pages by pasting a link directly into your note or through the share menu. How about creating a video note? This is made simple by adding a YouTube URL. Our editor has every rich text option you can imagine to create beautiful and comprehensive notes. We can add your current location to a note when you save it so you can see where you're taking notes.

You’ll get all of these features and a ton more. Note-ify packs a punch with a host of premium features.

Discover a beautiful feature rich app that not only looks stunning but will keep all of your important notes and documents organised. Want a dark theme to match your system? No problem. Our dark theme is easy on the eye and easy on your battery. Your theme preference will be synced across all of your devices. The social area is a great way to share notes. Simply add friends and get started. The version history system will keep track of who edited the note and changes will update in real-time. The notification area and push notifications will keep you updated on notes that people have shared with you and received friend requests.

There are loads of ways to share your notes: Email notes, share through another app or share with a friend in one click. Note-ify is available on iOS, Android and Web. Sync notes and data across all of your devices in real-time.

Hit the star button to favourite and easily navigate to your most important notes. Embed web pages by pasting a link directly into your note or through the share menu. How about creating a video note? This is made simple by adding a YouTube URL. Our editor has every rich text option you can imagine to create beautiful and comprehensive notes. We can add your current location to a note when you save it so you can see where you're taking notes.

You’ll get all of these features and a ton more. Note-ify packs a punch with a host of premium features.

Discover a beautiful feature rich app that not only looks stunning but will keep all of your important notes and documents organised. Use folders, favourites, search, task management and version history to keep track of what matters to you and never lose important information. Need some inspiration? Start with one of our pre-built templates to kick off your note taking. We’ve even built a liking system so you can see which templates people love.

Want a dark theme to match your system? No problem. Our dark theme is easy on the eye and easy on your battery. Your theme preference will be synced across all of your devices. The social area is a great way to share notes. Simply add friends and get started. The version history system will keep track of who edited the note and changes will update in real-time. The notification area and push notifications will keep you updated on notes that people have shared with you and received friend requests.

There are loads of ways to share your notes: Email notes, share through another app or share with a friend in one click. Note-ify is available on iOS, Android and Web. Sync notes and data across all of your devices in real-time.

Powered by Firebase and the Google Cloud Platform. Create, edit and share notes across any of your devices. No connection? No problem. Your data will be synced to the cloud and across your devices when a connection is established.

You never know what sparks a great idea. Get inspired, save your ideas, organise them and share with others – all from your phone or any other device! Start creating, managing and sharing your notes, to-do lists and tasks. Download and install Note-ify today and experience the next generation of note taking.
descriptionShort: Take better notes, organise, manage & share.

Capture your ideas instantly. Add friends, share notes and start collaborating with the click of a button. Templates, to-do lists, meetings, project management, videos, web pages and more. With Note-ify, you'll have everything in one place.

Note-ify is available everywhere with all of your data syncing securely across all of your devices in real-time. Note-ify makes it easy to organise, sort and find your important information. Our editor provides all of the formatting options you could possibly ask for. Attach images, videos, audio, files and anything else you can think of. Our secure cloud infrastructure ensures that your data is yours and will never be compromised. Convert handwritten notes into a digital format with machine learning text recognition.

Note-ify is an indispensable tool when it comes to productivity and collaboration. Add as many friends as you want to a note and start collaborating. Changes are instantly synced and a detailed version history keeps track of who made what changes.

Back to basics
- Discover the essence of a great note taking app
- Create quickly and easily
- Manage, share and collaborate

Capture ideas
- Create, manage and organise with folders, checklists, to-do lists
- Use templates to quickly get started capturing meeting notes, project details and more
- Embed full web pages with the click of a button
- Add YouTube videos and start creating notes on what you're watching
- Add friends, share notes in one click and start collaborating
- All the formatting options you could ask for in our editor
- Attach images, videos, audio, files and more
- Powerful search to instantly find the information that you need
- Create notes by inserting text from images - powered by machine learning

Organisation and productivity
- Star your important notes to quickly find your favourites
- Email your notes instantly
- Add your location to your notes and start plotting visually
- Beautiful light and dark themes
- Make personal to-do lists to keep your thoughts organised
- Keep track with a comprehensive version history of every note

Access anywhere
- All of your notes and data sync across all of your devices in real-time
- Secure cloud infrastructure to ensure that your data is safe

Discover a beautiful feature rich app that not only looks stunning but will keep all of your important notes and documents organised. Use folders, favourites, search, task management and version history to keep track of what matters to you and never lose important information. Need some inspiration? Start with one of our pre-built templates to kick off your note taking. Quickly capture and digitise your handwritten notes making them fully searchable by inserting text from an image. Powered by machine learning.

You never know what sparks a great idea. Get inspired, save your ideas, organise them and share with others – all from your phone or any other device! Start creating, managing and sharing your notes, to-do lists and tasks. Download and install Note-ify today and experience the next generation of note taking.

Price may vary by location. Subscriptions will be charged to your credit card through your Google Play account. Where applicable, your subscription will automatically renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Manage subscriptions in your account settings after purchase.

Capture your ideas instantly. Create notes, manage your tasks, organise with to-do lists, save web pages, embed YouTube videos and more. With Note-ify, you'll have everything in one place and you'll never needs another notes app.

Note-ify is available everywhere with all of your data syncing securely across all of your devices in real-time. Note-ify makes it easy to create, manage and search your important information. Our editor provides all of the formatting options you could possibly imagine and then some. Our secure cloud infrastructure ensures that your data will never be compromised.

Note-ify is an indispensable tool when it comes to productivity. Comprehensive note version history keeps track of your changes. Export your note via email or to PDF with the click of a button. Secure your folders with biometrics or a passcode. Extract text from images with machine learning text recognition.

Back to basics
- Discover the essence of a great note taking app
- Create quickly and easily
- Organise and manage

Capture ideas
- Create, manage and organise with folders, checklists, to-do lists and more
- Embed full web pages with the click of a button
- Embed images, videos and YouTube videos in your notes
- Use your device's camera to embed images and video
- Secure folders with device passcode or biometrics
- All the formatting options you could need in our editor
- Create note or task reminders with the click of a button
- Add notes and tasks to your calendar
- Extract text from images
- Powerful search and suggestions based on your note content to instantly find the information you need

Organisation and productivity
- Star your important notes to quickly find your favorites or check your recent notes
- Email your notes instantly
- Add your location to your notes and start plotting visually
- Beautiful light and dark themes
- Personalise your look with the accent colour of your choice
- Make to-do lists to keep your thoughts organised
- Keep track with a comprehensive version history of every note
- Export your notes to PDF
- Manage your files
- Manage your notes with tags

Access anywhere
- All of your notes and data sync across all of your devices in real-time
- Secure cloud infrastructure to ensure that your data is safe

Discover a beautiful feature rich app that not only looks stunning but will keep all of your important notes, documents and files organised. Use folders, recent notes, starred notes, search, task management and version history to keep track of what matters to you and never lose important information.

You never know what sparks a great idea. Get inspired, save your ideas, and create on the good – all from your phone, tablet or desktop. Start creating, organising and managing now. Download and install Note-ify for free today and experience the next generation of note taking.

Price may vary by location. Subscriptions will be charged to your credit card through your Google Play account. Where applicable, your subscription will automatically renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Manage subscriptions in your account settings after purchase.

Are you looking for a great note taking, to-do list and task management app? You’ve come to the right place. We’ve got all of this and more. Note-ify packs a punch with tons of premium features.

Capture your ideas instantly. Create notes, manage your tasks, organise with to-do lists, save web pages, embed YouTube videos and more. With Note-ify, you'll have everything in one place and you'll never needs another notes app.

Note-ify is available everywhere with all of your data syncing securely across all of your devices in real-time. Note-ify makes it easy to create, manage and search your important information. Our editor provides all of the formatting options you could possibly imagine and then some. Our secure cloud infrastructure ensures that your data will never be compromised.

Note-ify is an indispensable tool when it comes to productivity. Comprehensive note version history keeps track of your changes. Export your note via email or to PDF with the click of a button. Secure your folders with biometrics or a passcode. Extract text from images with machine learning text recognition.

Back to basics
- Discover the essence of a great note taking app
- Create quickly and easily
- Organise and manage

Capture ideas
- Create, manage and organise with folders, checklists, to-do lists and more
- Embed full web pages with the click of a button
- Embed images, videos and YouTube videos in your notes
- Use your device's camera to embed images and video
- Secure folders with device passcode or biometrics
- All the formatting options you could need in our editor
- Create note or task reminders with the click of a button
- Add notes and tasks to your calendar
- Extract text from images
- Powerful search and suggestions based on your note content to instantly find the information you need

Organisation and productivity
- Star your important notes to quickly find your favorites or check your recent notes
- Email your notes instantly
- Add your location to your notes and start plotting visually
- Beautiful light and dark themes
- Personalise your look with the accent colour of your choice
- Make to-do lists to keep your thoughts organised
- Keep track with a comprehensive version history of every note
- Export your notes to PDF
- Manage your files
- Manage your notes with tags

Access anywhere
- All of your notes and data sync across all of your devices in real-time
- Secure cloud infrastructure to ensure that your data is safe

Discover a beautiful feature rich app that not only looks stunning but will keep all of your important notes, documents and files organised. Use folders, recent notes, starred notes, search, task management and version history to keep track of what matters to you and never lose important information.

You never know what sparks a great idea. Get inspired, save your ideas, and create on the good – all from your phone, tablet or desktop. Start creating, organising and managing now. Download and install Note-ify for free today and experience the next generation of note taking.

Price may vary by location. Subscriptions will be charged to your credit card through your Google Play account. Where applicable, your subscription will automatically renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Manage subscriptions in your account settings after purchase.
